backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases and user profiles, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report identifying a single high-confidence fix needed in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts` to restore correct surgery case fetching for DashboardView and CasesListView.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Cached summaries of all frontend source files describing each component's purpose, props, and notable implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the SurgiPaw Vite/React app with PWA meta tags, manifest link, favicon, and a root div mounting point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, theme colors, display mode, and icon assets at multiple sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and bypass rules for auth and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky app header with login controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG workflow icon for the Culture task type rendered via WorkflowIconBase with three small circles representing microbial growth.
SVG workflow icon for the Discharge Notes task showing a document with a checkmark polyline.
SVG workflow icon for the Follow-Up task depicting a circular arrow with a corner polyline.
SVG workflow icon for the Histopathology task showing a microscope-like shape with a circle and arc paths.
SVG workflow icon for the Imaging task depicting a framed rectangle with a trend-line polyline.
SVG workflow icon for the Labs task showing a test tube shape with a horizontal line.
SVG workflow icon for the PDVM Notified task depicting a speech bubble with a tail.
SVG workflow icon for the Surgery Report task showing a document with diagonal scalpel lines.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Maps task type strings to their corresponding icon components and renders the appropriate icon based on the provided type prop.
Base SVG wrapper component for workflow icons that applies consistent size, stroke color, and style tokens to its children.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Exports shared design tokens for workflow icons including a color map per task type, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file intended to define an authentication context for the application.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file intended to implement the authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout.
Empty file intended to implement a login form component.
Empty file intended to implement a logout button component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Empty file intended to implement a user registration form component.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Empty file intended to contain authentication-related validation logic.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the checklist item configuration for surgery case tasks and provides utility functions to get default selections, remaining incomplete items, and task colors.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file intended to implement a camera capture modal component.
Expandable card component displaying surgery case details, remaining checklist tasks, and actions for toggling task completion, editing, and deleting a case.
Dialog form for editing an existing surgery case's patient details, dates, and task checklist selections, submitting updates via a mutation hook.
Dialog form for creating a new surgery case with fields for patient info, task selections, speech-to-text quick fill, and auto-parsing of structured text input.

Main list view component for surgery cases that combines search, filtering (species, tasks), sorting, and pagination with loading/error/empty states, and includes buttons for creating new cases and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a search icon and a clear (X) button that calls an onChange callback as the user types.
A dropdown select control for choosing a sort option from the predefined SORT_OPTIONS list, displayed alongside an ArrowUpDown icon.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other) using checkboxes, with selection state persisted to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and a 'show all tasks completed' toggle, with filter state persisted to sessionStorage.
Renders a checklist of selected task items for a given Task, allowing each item to be toggled complete/incomplete via checkboxes with workflow icons.
Provides CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, handling file parsing, progress tracking, and calling create/update mutations for each imported case with error reporting via toasts.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY text entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, with blur validation and an onComplete callback for field auto-advance.
Provides functions to export surgery cases to a CSV file and import cases from a CSV file, including row parsing, field validation, and error collection.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript types, and validation constants for species, sex, and boolean values.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports utility functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API to provide recording state, transcript accumulation, error handling, and start/stop controls.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts to produce cleaner text for further parsing.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object by mapping recognized field labels to their corresponding typed values.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a styled HTML report of surgery cases that have at least one incomplete task, using a hidden iframe.
Generates and triggers a CSV download of all surgery cases, including patient details and remaining checklist tasks, with proper CSV field escaping.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Utility functions for formatting dates, species, sex enums, and task lists into human-readable strings for PDF display.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Utility functions for formatting dates, species, and sex enums into human-readable strings for CSV report output.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of surgery cases by a search query, matching against patient/owner fields and incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sort options and a function to sort surgery cases by arrival date or number of open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constants for species and sex dropdown options and the CaseFormData interface used in case creation/editing forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and utility functions for converting between Date objects, nanosecond timestamps, and formatted date strings.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases with filtering, searching, sorting, and stats, and supports adding new cases.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open task items from a surgery case and calculate the total count of open tasks across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor instance using the current Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that returns a debounced version of a given value, updating only after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks (useQuery/useMutation) for all backend actor calls related to surgery cases, tasks, user profiles, dashboard data, and OpenAI config.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-mode design system, including semantic color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends typography and animation plugins, and sets Inter as the default font.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for SurgiPaw tracking existing features, known issues (cases not loading on Dashboard/Cases page), and a pending fix request for DashboardView and CasesListView rendering.
